# Allergic conjunctivitis
## Also known as allergic eye
### Key points about allergic conjunctivitis
  * Allergic conjunctivitis is inflammation of the white part of your eye and the inside lining of your eyelids due to allergies.
  * It can be seasonal, occurring at certain times of the year (when due to pollen or grasses) or ongoing (when caused by dust mite or pets).
  * Allergic conjunctivitis can't be spread from person to person.
